model.name: Activity
model.description: Plays back the source at various speeds based on the movement of the activity parameter.

param.name: maxSpeed
param.description: Maximum value at which the playback speed of the source will be capped to.

param.name: action
param.description: Controls the playback of the source. The more this parameter is changed, the higher the speed of playback.

param.name: sensitivity
param.description: Sensitivity of the Action property. The higher the Sensitivity the lesser the change in Action is needed to affect the speed of playback

param.name: riseTime
param.description: Rate of increase of Play Speed. Affect how quickly Play Speed rises to a set value.

param.name: decayTime
param.description: Rate of decrease of Play Speed. Affect how quickly Play Speed decays to a set value.

param.name: startPoint
param.description: Starting point (as a fraction of the length of entire track) where the Looping should start from.

param.name: gain
param.description: The volume (loudness) of the audio produced by the model.

param.name: pan
param.description: Left/Right panning (in degrees) of the position of the source with respect to the listener
